name: The Sorcerer's Tower
description:
You wake up in a magic tower full of monsters, magic, and gold. Fling fireballs and fight your way to the top to defeat the evil sorcerer who's trapped you here. 

This is an early Proof of Concept that I'm uploading so that you all can follow along with the development of the game. 

Version 0.0.1 (Current Version)
- 1 Floor
- 1 Enemy
-1 Spell
- 3 Enchantments

Version 0.0.2 (Coming Feb. 06 2021)
- Endless Floors
- 3 Enemies
- 3 Spells
- 3 Enchantments
